text: The bare-tailed woolly mouse opossum (Marmosa regina) or short-furred woolly mouse opossum is a South American marsupial of the family Didelphidae. Its range includes Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, and Bolivia. It is found in tropical rainforest in the westernmost portion of the Amazon Basin and the eastern foothills of the Andes, at elevations up to 1634 m. It was formerly assigned to the genus Micoureus, which was made a subgenus of Marmosa in 2009. ==References== Bare-tailed woolly mouse opossum Category:Mammals of Bolivia Category:Mammals of Colombia Category:Mammals of Ecuador Category:Mammals of Peru Category:Taxa named by Oldfield Thomas Category:Mammals described in 1898 es:Micoureus#Micoureus regina
title: Bare-tailed woolly mouse opossum
